value.name: Video Released Of Man Attacking Cop With Shovel, Fatally Shot By Police
value.description: A man in Salt Lake City was fatally wounded by a police officer following an interaction on Thursday that rapidly escalated. The victim has since been identified as 42-year old James Dudley Barker.
